meanings.definition: A container or basket used for holding bread.
meanings.sent1: The baker placed freshly baked loaves in the breadbaskets.
meanings.sent2: The picnic was perfect with sandwiches packed in the breadbaskets.
meanings.sent3: At the bakery, the mischievous cat jumped into the breadbaskets and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: The breadbaskets in the kitchen were like hungry mouths waiting to be filled.
meanings.sent5: The breadbaskets woven with care held the warmth of the bakery.

meanings.definition: A region or country that produces a large amount of bread.
meanings.sent1: The Midwest is known as the breadbasket of the United States.
meanings.sent2: The fertile plains of the breadbasket region yield abundant wheat crops.
meanings.sent3: In the land of the breadbaskets, even the birds sing songs about wheat.
meanings.sent4: The breadbasket countries nourish the world with their wheat harvests.
meanings.sent5: The breadbasket area stretches as far as the eye can see, golden with wheat fields.
